document.full_text: a projected spate of extinctions of animals and plants this century may be less drastic than feared because the most widely used scientific method can exaggerate losses by more than 160 percent, a study said on wednesday.
document.title: plant, animal extinctions often exaggerated: study
lines_and_colors: a projected spate of extinctions of animals and plants this century may be less drastic than feared because the most widely used scientific method can exaggerate losses by more than 160 percent, a study said on wednesday.
